sloka: एतत् श्रुत्वा रहः सूतो राजानम् इदम् अब्रवीत् ।
श्रूयताम् तत् पुरा वृत्तम् पुराणे च मया श्रुतम् ॥१-९-१॥

en_hs: SUMANTRA, having heard of the preparations for the sacrifice, obtained a private audience with his sovereign and said: 'I have heard of a tradition, formerly related to me by the august brahmins.'
